LegalKnowledge.title: Legal Knowledge Article
LegalKnowledge.description: Represents a single article or section of a legal document (Proclamation, Code, Regulation).

source.description: The name of the source document (e.g., 'Proclamation No. 1183/2020').

branch.description: The primary legal branch this article belongs to (e.g., 'Administrative Law').

type.description: The type of legal document (e.g., 'Proclamation', 'Civil Code', 'Regulation').

sub_article.description: The sub-article or paragraph number, if any (e.g., '1', 'a').

title.description: The official title of the article, if it has one.

body.description: The full, cleaned text of the legal article.

keywords.description: An array of keywords for search indexing.
